full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 663 Filed 06/15/22 Page 59 of 77emergency or time off for something personal or simply being empathetic: providing time to talk, to listen to someone's problems.
Ghislaine's commitment to ocean conservation and the creation of a charity that engaged with literally thousands of people across the globe is an example of what her drive, determination and ability to organise can achieve.
I urge you to take into the balance of your consideration about sentencing, notwithstanding the gravity of the offences of which she has been found guilty, Ghislaine's previous lifetime good character, the high regard and continuing love and esteem of her friends and family based on a lifetime's knowledge of her, her character, conduct and achievements: the very real hope and expectation that she be allowed to participate with and contribute to once more her family, friends and society at large.
Yours sincerely
Kevin Maxwell
Kevin Maxwell
DOJ-OGR-00010505

text_blocks.content: emergency or time off for something personal or simply being empathetic: providing time to talk, to listen to someone's problems.

Ghislaine's commitment to ocean conservation and the creation of a charity that engaged with literally thousands of people across the globe is an example of what her drive, determination and ability to organise can achieve.

I urge you to take into the balance of your consideration about sentencing, notwithstanding the gravity of the offences of which she has been found guilty, Ghislaine's previous lifetime good character, the high regard and continuing love and esteem of her friends and family based on a lifetime's knowledge of her, her character, conduct and achievements: the very real hope and expectation that she be allowed to participate with and contribute to once more her family, friends and society at large.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to the sentencing of Ghislaine, with a letter from Kevin Maxwell attesting to her character. The document is well-formatted and legible, with a handwritten signature.
